item.description:
Another movie meetup!

We'll meet around 3:40-3:45 PM in the lobby and then head up to the theatre to find seats.

After the movie, we'll head over to the Red Hat (9 Bowdoin St, upstairs) for food & drink. If you can't make it to the movie, feel free to meet us there - probably around 6:30 PM.

Here's the link to Fandango:
http://www.fandango.com/amcloewsbostoncommon19_aapnv/theaterpage?date=1%2F28%2F2012

Here's a post at the National Review Online, which links to a full review:
http://www.nationalreview.com/home-front/286851/ithe-iron-ladyi-wonderfully-conservatively-subversive/nancy-french

..."Because the creators, whatever their personal political beliefs, had the artistic integrity to let Thatcher be Thatcher, the film becomes a rousing call to those who believe that “those who can do, must get up and DO.”
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in lobby 3:40-3:45, or in the theatre
item.name: Movie Meetup: The Iron Lady
